description: Try our easy to follow Roast Pumpkin & Olive Free-Form Tarts recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Roast Pumpkin & Olive Free-Form Tarts Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 120ml Monini Classico Extra Virgin Olive Oil (to serve)
350g kent pumpkin, peeled, deseeded and cut into 3cm pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Place pumpkin on a lined baking tray. Drizzle with 1 tbs Monini Classico Extra Virgin Olive Oil and bake for 25 minutes or until golden. Set aside to cool.

Meanwhile, place flour and salt in a large bowl. Add 1/4 cup Monini Classico Italian Extra Virgin Olive Oil and combine with a fork. Add 2 tbs ice-cold water and combine first with a fork and then with your hands to form a smooth dough. Wrap in baking paper and rest for 15 minutes in the fridge.
Divide into 4 portions. Roll out each portion on a lightly floured surface to roughly 15cm in diameter. Place pastry on a large baking paper-lined baking tray.

Place one-quarter of the pumpkin in centre of each pastry round. Top each with 4 pitted olives and season with pepper. Fold pastry edge over filling and roughly pleat. Brush pastry with 1 tbs Monini Classico Italian Extra Virgin Olive Oil.

Bake for 35 minutes. Add feta and 2 tsp chopped sage to tarts halfway through cooking, or until pastry is golden. Scatter tarts with 10 sage leaves and serve drizzled with 2 tbs Monini Classico Italian Extra Virgin Olive Oil.
